Package de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.particle

Class GraphicalParticlePosition

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.spices.PointInSpace
de.gnwi.mfsim.model.graphics.particle.GraphicalParticlePosition
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGraphicalParticlePosition, de.gnwi.spices.IPointInSpace
public class GraphicalParticlePosition extends de.gnwi.spices.PointInSpace implements IGraphicalParticlePosition
Position of a specific graphical particle in the simulation box
Author:
Stefan Neumann, Achim Zielesny
